attributes.additional_details:
Hostility and violence breed hostility and violence.

By indiscriminately bombing those suspected of being involved ISIS many innocent people will be killed. This will breed hostility, hatred and eventual terrorism instead of cancelling it.

Corporate entities such as those owned by Rupert Murdoch stand to gain monetarily from a battle with ISIS whereas normal people face a greater risk of terror attacks.

Show the people that they are more important than corporate entities and don't get involved in air strikes that jeopardise people in the middle east and at home.
